<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is a <S%H7072>jealous<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> and <S%H5358>avenges.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5358>avenges<s%> and is full of <S%H1167>wrath.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> takes <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> on his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and he <S%H5201>maintains<s%> wrath against his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H3581>power,<s%> and will by no <S%H5352>means<s%> leave the guilty <S%H5352>unpunished.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has his <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> and in the <S%H8183>storm,<s%> and the <S%H6051>clouds<s%> are the <S%H80>dust<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

He <S%H1605>rebukes<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and makes it <S%H2717>dry,<s%> and dries <S%H3001>up<s%> all the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H535>languishes,<s%> and <S%H3760>Carmel;<s%> and the <S%H6525>flower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H535>languishes.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>quake<s%> before <S%H1389>him,<s%> and the hills <S%H4127>melt<s%> <S%H776>away.<s%> The earth <S%H5375>trembles<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence,<s%> <S%H8398>yes,<s%> the world, and all who dwell in <S%H3427>it.<s%>

Who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation?<s%> Who can <S%H6965>endure<s%> the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger?<s%> His <S%H2534>wrath<s%> is poured <S%H5413>out<s%> like <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> are broken apart by <S%H5422>him.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H2896>good,<s%> a <S%H4581>stronghold<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> and he <S%H3045>knows<s%> those who take refuge in <S%H2620>him.<s%>

But with an <S%H5674>overflowing<s%> <S%H7858>flood,<s%> he will <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> of her <S%H4725>place,<s%> and will <S%H7291>pursue<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness.<s%>
What do you <S%H2803>plot<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> He will <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end.<s%> <S%H6869>Affliction<s%> <S%H6965>won't<s%> rise up the second <S%H6471>time.<s%>

For <S%H5440>entangled<s%> like <S%H5518>thorns,<s%> and <S%H5433>drunken<s%> as with their <S%H5435>drink,<s%> they are <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H4392>utterly<s%> like <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>stubble.<s%>
There is one gone forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H2803>you,<s%> who devises <S%H7451>evil<s%> against <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H3289>counsels<s%> <S%H1100>wickedness.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> "Though they be in full <S%H8003>strength,<s%> and likewise <S%H7227>many,<s%> even so they will be cut <S%H1494>down,<s%> and he shall pass <S%H5674>away.<s%> Though I have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> <S%H6031>you,<s%> I will afflict you no more.
Now will I <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H4132>yoke<s%> from off <S%H5423>you,<s%> and will burst your <S%H4147>bonds<s%> <S%H5423>apart.<s%>"

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> concerning <S%H2232>you:<s%> "No more descendants will bear your <S%H8034>name.<s%> Out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>gods,<s%> will I cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the engraved <S%H6459>image<s%> and the molten <S%H4541>image.<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6913>grave,<s%> for you are <S%H7043>vile.<s%>"

<S%H2022>Behold,<s%> on the mountains the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him who brings good <S%H1319>news,<s%> who <S%H8085>publishes<s%> <S%H7965>peace!<s%> <S%H2287>Keep<s%> your <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> <S%H3063>Judah!<s%> <S%H7999>Perform<s%> your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> for the <S%H1100>wicked<s%> one will no <S%H3254>more<s%> pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H3772>you.<s%> He is utterly cut off.
